about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the complete soundtrack from The Lamplighters League and the Tower at the End of the World, featuring 24 original tracks by award-winning composer Jon Everist, recorded at historic Abbey Road Studio 1. The perfect companion for your 1930's capers, daring rescues, heists, and battles with supernatural villains. Jon Everist's soundtrack effortlessly moves from jazz-inspired noir to heart-pumping, larger-than-life-adventure as you recruit the best of the worst to come together to save the world.

To access The Lamplighters League original soundtrack files (MP3 and WAV) go to your Steam main folder; by default, the path is:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\music\LamplightersLeague[/i]

The perfect companion for your 1930's capers, daring rescues, heists, and battles with supernatural villains. Jon Everist's soundtrack effortlessly moves from jazz-inspired noir to heart-pumping, larger-than-life-adventure as you recruit the best of the worst to come together to save the world.

To access The Lamplighters League original soundtrack files (MP3 and WAV) go to your Steam main folder; by default, the path is:
